newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - MAPICS rated buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - MAPICS rated buy.

text.p: Dain Bosworth analyst Barry Randall said Thursday he initiated coverage of MAPICS Inc with a buy rating.
-- The company, previously known as Marcam Corp, sells enterprise application software for manufacturers.

-- "We believe MAPICS' shares, currently trading at just 13.3 times our EPS estimate for fiscal 1998, are undervalued, but unfairly so, because of its prior association with a money-losing operation inside Marcam," Randall said in a report.
-- "Now MAPICS Inc is a separate firm with positive operating cash flow and a bright outlook," he added.
-- MAPICS shares on Friday were off 1/8 at 9-5/8.
